In tanti anni di gioco online non mi ero mai avventurato in un gioco come questo. la meccanica Ã¨ estremamente semplice classico schema tutti contro uno... o se preferite uno contro tutti! ;) lo scopo Ã¨ ben chiaro  sin dal principio ma le variabili che vengono messe in campo dalla squadra, che dovrebbe cooperare e dal comportamento, piu o meno onesto, del killer rendono ogni partita unica nel suo genere.
Se si "incontrano" player-killer che preferiscono non "camperare" il gioco assume risvolti interessanti con delle forti connotazioni di suspence e di coinvolgimento attraverso frenetici susseguirsi di inseguimenti caratterizzati da tensioni piu o meno presenti a seconda della calma che si riesce a mantenere.
Se il killer si limita a camperare... la noia regna sovrana. 
Peccato che, per la presenza di molti bug ormai risolti, il gioco sia partito in ritardo... lasciando a casa molti giocatori.
Insomma... da provare se non si soffre di cuore. Assieme ad amici Ã¨ ancora piu avvincente!

I bought DbD on a friend's recommendation and had only seen a bit of gameplay on a stream. I was hoping the game would work seamlessly and thought I'd have fun playing this with friends, however I was horribly wrong. This game barely has any options, and while I understand that grass and fog have to be the same for everyone to avoid an unfair advantage, I'm pissed about not being able to tune the antialiasing method or motion blur, as this game appears to use either TAA, which I hate, or a terrible FXAA that makes everything slightly blurry even on the highest graphical settings. Not only that, but I found out that keybinding options are lackluster to say the least, and in a game that requires stealth there's no option for crouch toggle, meaning I have to hold down a key for minutes on end without any other option around it. Worse, devs had promised they would address the terrible control options on June, DURING 2016. It's been more than one year and after several paid dlc they haven't fixed any of the issues I've mentioned. I'm awfully disappointed with both the game and the developers and will be sharing my experience with my peers.

I can't believe how fun the game is, when it works.

You introduce a known character like Freddy, and you buff the hell out of him until there is no point in going against him. You can barely out run him, he finds you super easy. Why introduce him, to bolster sales?

The Hag is another paid for character that is almost impossible to outrun. Traps, really? She hangs someone up, puts a trap, then takes you out. Traps in front of the objectives, too. Real cute. Barely can win a match with her.

I feel like you reward people who are willing to literally spend half the price of the game  just to shit on other players with over powered Killers.

Matchmaking? I have NEVER seen matchmaking this bad outside of CLOSED Alphas. Nothing really more to say on that matter.

6 different types of toolboxes, 5 different med-kits, and countless add-ons for them. 

Offerings, c'mon. Useless bullshit to try and add depth to a scoring system.

I've had the game for 3 days, and I'm almost to level 50. IE: leveling is a joke!

Remove the useless add-ons and uber variety with tools, balance the over buffed characters, and fix the matchmaking and this game would give little, to no reason to complain.

I really enjoy this game. I play with my friends, we have a lot of fun! 
The overall game is good, cool looking killers, well done!

Pros:
- Fun with friends.
- Even though it's fun, is also serious and tense.
- Offers good challenges to the players.
- Teamwork is necessary for the sake of everyone!

Cons:
- At the moment, Fredy Krueger is unbalanced, almost impossible to win against. Making the game boring.
- A few bugs like the one that resets your levels, so always backup your save.
- Take some time to release new content.
- People camping the spot. Report those people for not doing the game's objective.

Overall, i recomend the game! You can have a lot of FUN <3

EDIT 1: As for 04/12/2017, the game matchmaking sucks, i can't find a match playable, i can't actually FIND a match. When i do, 80% of time the ping is unplayable. FIX THIS.

Otherwise, the game is cool.
Love The Game
Otimo, gostei muito, valeu a pena gastar cada centavo por esse jogo
